name: get_count_and_increase_by_one
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool counter.
Tool description: Count views on your website or any other specific action on your application.
API description: Sends a GET request to the specified counter API, optionally including parameters for ID, label, and color,

is_id.description: An ID to include in the request query. Default is None.

clabel.description: A label to include in the request query. Default is 'blue'.

color.description: A color to include in the request query. Default is 'red'.
